item.description:
Hello Girls (guys you may or may not want to just ignore this :-)!!)

Hard to believe, but yes - sometimes I am quite passionate around the kitchen - I love to cook and bake, so I am hosting a "Pampered Cheff" Party on July 29th at 7 p.m. at my house.

For those of you who do not know the concept of "Pampered Chef" have a look at www.pamperedchef.com for more details. Basically we will get introduced to versatile, high-quality kitchen tools that fit any budget and will learn tips to make cooking and entertaining easier. We will also learn impressive, budget-friendly recipes that are ready in 30 minutes or less. Sounds like fun to me - what about you, lovely ladies??

I will prepare some drinks and finger food and would love for you to join me for some "girlie stuff".

- Hanna
item.name: This one is for the girls!!!
